entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
